name: Forest Grove (itch)
description:
FOREST GROVE
A playable build of my art project that I worked on for a few months! Not much gameplay besides being able to run around and furiously sit down. If this is something you like and would be keen to see more developed (and have an actual game) in the future please let me know! 

WASD movement, L SHIFT to sprint, E to sit, ESC to close game
